title: Team profile generator
description: The application prompts the user for command-line input about employees (such as managers, engineers, and interns), and based on that input, it generates an HTML webpage.

title: Code quiz
description: A timed coding quiz app with multiple-choice questions.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather Dashboard app that allows a user to stay up to date with the weather forecast in a chosen location

title: Job Search tracker
description: An app that helps a user keep track of the job search.

title: Password Generator
description: An app that generates a random password based on criteria a user selects.

title: README.md Generator
description: A Node.js command-line app to generate README.md.
